snippet: The college’s president says the school, which has started charging tuition, continues to attract top students.
abstract: Letter from Jamshed Bharucha, president, The Cooper Union for the Advancement of Science and Art, comments on April 5 article about falling application rate to the school after it decided to charge tuition for the first time.
lead_paragraph: The college’s president says the school, which has started charging tuition, continues to attract top students.

keywords.value: Cooper Union for the Advancement of Science and Art
keywords.name: organizations
